humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there is 1 positive lymph node out of 10 examined in level I (Level I: 1/10). Based on the new rule 12, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient had 1 out of 10 examined level I axillary lymph nodes positive for metastatic carcinoma, and there was extranodal extension of carcinoma >2 mm. This corresponds to pN2a (pT any, 1-3 positive axillary nodes, N1mi-N3) as per the AJCC 8th edition.
